overview: PULL FOCUS: GASOMETER shows how illusion and reality are interchangeable. It is engaged with ideas around movement and stillness, and with the different ways that a work of art can be both experienced in time and in turn can represent time. Lewisâ€˜ work highlights, through film, that what is always present in a great pictorial work of art is a depiction embedded in a complex relationship to time.
title: Pull Focus  Gasometer
